barker_notes.barker_summary: M. M. Battle to Austin, September 30, 1828. A sight draft to be paid in livestock and cash.
barker_notes.barker_citation: Eugene Barker, ed., Annual Report of the American Historical Association for the Year 1919: The Austin Papers, (Washington, D.C.: Government Printing Office, 1924), 3 vols., Vol 1, Part 2, pp. 121

text.body:
*div1 type="summary"* *p*M. M. Battle to Austin, September 30, 1828. A sight draft to be paid in livestock and cash.*/p* */div1*
*div1 type="body"*
*p**person_mentioned*Col S. F. Austin*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*please pay *person_mentioned*Mr. Florence Stack*/person_mentioned* or his order One hundred and five Dols in the Manner following, (Viz) Thirty Eight and a third dollars in cash, and a Mule at Cash price, and Cows and Calves at Cash price, to complete the above Sum and Charge the same to my a/c it being the amt. due him for work on your *location_mentioned*building*/location_mentioned*.*/p*
*p**location_mentioned*San Felipe*/location_mentioned* *date_mentioned n="09-30-1828">30th of Sep 1828*/date_mentioned**/p*
*p**person_mentioned*M. M. Battle */person_mentioned*[Rubric]*/p*
*p*[Indorsements:] Accepted to be paid as within specified*/p*
*p**date_mentioned n="10-01-1828">October 1, 1828*/date_mentioned*—*/p*
*p**person_mentioned*Stephen F. Austin */person_mentioned*[Rubric]*/p*
*p*Recd on the fifteen dollars in Cash *person_mentioned*Wm Moore*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Recd Sixty dollars in cattle*/p*
*p*Recd sixteen dollars and fifty cents *person_mentioned*Waller White*/person_mentioned**/p*
*p*Recd eight do *person_mentioned*Mr. Cooper*/person_mentioned*—*/p*
*/div1*
